殊.definition: (literary) to kill; to behead; to sever; to separate; to surpass; (bound form) different; (bound form) special; remarkable; (literary) very; extremely

殊域周咨錄.definition: Ming dynasty record (1574) of exploration and foreign relations

殊榮.definition: special glory; distinction; rare honor; one's laurels; it's a privilege (to meet you)

殊死.definition: to behead; capital punishment; desperate struggle; life-and-death

殊深軫念.definition: extreme solicitude (idiom); expressing the deepest condolences; to feel deeply concerned

殊途同歸.definition: different routes to the same destination (idiom); fig. different means of achieve the same end
